title: Youn's Kitchen
overview: Yoon Yeo Jung, Lee Seo Jun, Jung Yoo Mi and Shin Goo are to open a Korean restaurant on an island in Bali, Indonesia, to serve local people and tourists. Taking up the roles of CEO, director and assistant chef respectively, the three get to experience freedom in a foreign place, but they also need to work things out together despite difference in personality and opinions.
